short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Gordon Hayward' or 'Hayward' with a random selection from a list of alternatives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension searches through a web page and replaces all instances of "Hayward" and/or "Gordon Hayward" with a randomly selected alternative. Right now, the extension only works on r/UtahJazz and r/nba. More settings and alternatives to come!
